item.title: Second Year Essay
item.description: In my second year I wrote The Isoperimetric Problem: Geometry and Analysis and I guess I’m quite proud of it. I think the markers didn’t like the fact that I didn’t provide pin-point references, so sorry! Although, below is a list of some references which I think you might want to take a look at: Felix Bernstein. “Über die isoperimetrische Eigenschaft des Kreises auf der Kugeloberfläche und in der Ebene”.

item.title: Summer Research Project 2020
item.description: Over the summer I did a project in free boundary minimal annuli in the unit ball. Specifically, I studied an object called the critical catenoid, which is the only known example of a free boundary minimal annulus in the unit ball. I made a poster. This is an image I made of the critical catenoid with POV-Ray. I can’t seem to get the lighting or material just how I want it.
